languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, Равор на связи. Астропаты в своей комнатушке с ума сходят, докладывая о серьезных возмущениях в варпе на нашем пути. Выглядит так, словно Зев абсолютно непроходим. Бывало такое на моем веку, да, и, если спросите — нельзя туда соваться. Ни нам, ни кому-то еще".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, астропаты докладывают о серьезных возмущениях в варпе, отмеченных на нашем маршруте. Высока вероятность того, что в данный момент Зев полностью непроходим для нас, как и для любого другого судна".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Ravor on the line. The Astropaths are going crazy in their little chamber — they are reporting severe warp disturbances along our intended route. It looks like the Maw is completely impassable. I've seen this before, yes, and, if you ask me, going in there is not a good idea. For us or any other voidship."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, Равор на связи. Астропаты в своей комнатушке с ума сходят, докладывая о серьезных возмущениях в варпе на нашем пути. Выглядит так, словно Зев абсолютно непроходим. Бывало такое на моем веку, да, и, если спросите — нельзя туда соваться. Ни нам, ни кому-то еще".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the astropaths are reporting that severe warp disturbances noted along our intended route. There is a high probability that at the moment the Maw is completely impassable for us, as well as for any other voidship."

"Lord Captain, the astropaths are reporting that severe warp disturbances noted along our intended route. There is a high probability that at the moment the Maw is completely impassable for us, as well as for any other voidship."

"Lord Captain, Ravor on the line. The Astropaths are going crazy in their little chamber — they are reporting severe warp disturbances along our intended route. It looks like the Maw is completely impassable. I've seen this before, yes, and, if you ask me, going in there is not a good idea. For us or any other voidship."

"Lord Captain, Ravor on the line. The Astropaths are going crazy in their little chamber — they are reporting severe warp disturbances along our intended route. It looks like the Maw is completely impassable. I've seen this before, yes, and, if you ask me, going in there is not a good idea. For us or any other voidship."

"Lord Captain, Ravor on the line. The Astropaths are going crazy in their little chamber — they are reporting severe warp disturbances along our intended route. It looks like the Maw is completely impassable. I've seen this before, yes, and, if you ask me, going in there is not a good idea. For us or any other voidship."

languages.text: “船长老大，我是雷沃。那群星语者在他们自己的小房间里发疯了，他们说我们的预定路线上出现了严重的亚空间干扰。看起来，巨口已经完全无法通行了。老实说，这种情况我以前也遇到过。要我说的话，无论是对我们自己，还是对别的船来说，冲进那里恐怕都不是什么好主意。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Ravor on the line. The Astropaths are going crazy in their little chamber — they are reporting severe warp disturbances along our intended route. It looks like the Maw is completely impassable. I've seen this before, yes, and, if you ask me, going in there is not a good idea. For us or any other voidship."

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，我是雷沃。那群星语者在他们自己的小房间里发疯了，他们说我们的预定路线上出现了严重的亚空间干扰。看起来，巨口已经完全无法通行了。老实说，这种情况我以前也遇到过。要我说的话，无论是对我们自己，还是对别的船来说，冲进那里恐怕都不是什么好主意。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, al habla Ravor. Los astrópatas están enloqueciendo en su pequeña cámara. Informan de la presencia de perturbaciones de disformidad graves en la ruta planeada. Parece que las Fauces son completamente intransitables. Lo he visto antes, sí. Si me lo pregunta, adentrarnos ahí es una idea espantosa, ya sea para nosotros o para otra nave».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Ravor on the line. The Astropaths are going crazy in their little chamber — they are reporting severe warp disturbances along our intended route. It looks like the Maw is completely impassable. I've seen this before, yes, and, if you ask me, going in there is not a good idea. For us or any other voidship."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, al habla Ravor. Los astrópatas están enloqueciendo en su pequeña cámara. Informan de la presencia de perturbaciones de disformidad graves en la ruta planeada. Parece que las Fauces son completamente intransitables. Lo he visto antes, sí. Si me lo pregunta, adentrarnos ahí es una idea espantosa, ya sea para nosotros o para otra nave».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Ravor ist am Apparat. Die Astropathen spielen in ihrer kleinen Kammer verrückt — sie melden schwere Warp-Störungen entlang unserer geplanten Route. Es sieht so aus, als ob der Schlund völlig unpassierbar ist. Ich habe das schon einmal gesehen, ja, und wenn ihr mich fragt, ist es keine gute Idee, dort hineinzufliegen. Weder für uns noch für ein anderes Porenschiff."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Ravor on the line. The Astropaths are going crazy in their little chamber — they are reporting severe warp disturbances along our intended route. It looks like the Maw is completely impassable. I've seen this before, yes, and, if you ask me, going in there is not a good idea. For us or any other voidship."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Ravor on the line. The Astropaths are going crazy in their little chamber — they are reporting severe warp disturbances along our intended route. It looks like the Maw is completely impassable. I've seen this before, yes, and, if you ask me, going in there is not a good idea. For us or any other voidship."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, ici Ravor. Les astropathes sont comme fous dans leur petite salle... Ils signalent de graves perturbations du Warp sur notre trajectoire. Il semble que la Gueule soit totalement infranchissable. J'ai déjà vu pareille chose, et si vous voulez mon avis, s'aventurer là-dedans serait une mauvaise idée. Pour nous ou tout autre vaisseau spatial. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Ravor on the line. The Astropaths are going crazy in their little chamber — they are reporting severe warp disturbances along our intended route. It looks like the Maw is completely impassable. I've seen this before, yes, and, if you ask me, going in there is not a good idea. For us or any other voidship."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, ici Ravor. Les astropathes sont comme fous dans leur petite salle... Ils signalent de graves perturbations du Warp sur notre trajectoire. Il semble que la Gueule soit totalement infranchissable. J'ai déjà vu pareille chose, et si vous voulez mon avis, s'aventurer là-dedans serait une mauvaise idée. Pour nous ou tout autre vaisseau spatial. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、こちらラヴォアです。感応通信官が狭い自室で発狂しています。航行予定ルート沿いで、歪みがひどく荒れているとのことです。マウを通り抜けるのは到底不可能に見えます。えぇ、以前もこれを見ました。私に言わせれば、ここに入るのは良策とは言えません。私たちにも、他のヴォイドシップにも」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Ravor on the line. The Astropaths are going crazy in their little chamber — they are reporting severe warp disturbances along our intended route. It looks like the Maw is completely impassable. I've seen this before, yes, and, if you ask me, going in there is not a good idea. For us or any other voidship."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、こちらラヴォアです。感応通信官が狭い自室で発狂しています。航行予定ルート沿いで、歪みがひどく荒れているとのことです。マウを通り抜けるのは到底不可能に見えます。えぇ、以前もこれを見ました。私に言わせれば、ここに入るのは良策とは言えません。私たちにも、他のヴォイドシップにも」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Ravor konuşuyor. Astropatlar o küçük odalarında deliye dönmüş durumda, gittiğimiz rota üzerinde şiddetli öteboyut bozunumları raporluyorlar. Ağız kesinlikle geçit vermiyor gibi görünüyor. Bunu daha önce görmüştüm, evet. Bana sorarsanız oraya gitmek hiç de iyi bir fikir değil. Ne bizim için ne de herhangi başka bir uçsuz gemisi için."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Ravor on the line. The Astropaths are going crazy in their little chamber — they are reporting severe warp disturbances along our intended route. It looks like the Maw is completely impassable. I've seen this before, yes, and, if you ask me, going in there is not a good idea. For us or any other voidship."
